title: Colombia Markets Jolted as 23% Wage Boost Fuels Rate Hike Bets
description: Colombian swap rates soared Tuesday after President Gustavo Petro announced a 23% increase in the minimum wage, stoking bets that the central bank will have to hike interest rates to combat the policy’s impact on prices.
content: Colombian swap rates soared Tuesday after President Gustavo Petro announced a 23% increase in the minimum wage, stoking bets that the central bank will have to hike interest rates to combat the policy’s impact on prices.
